org.jgrapes.http

Class InMemorySessionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.ComponentVertex
      • org.jgrapes.core.Component
        • org.jgrapes.http.InMemorySessionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<ComponentType>, Channel, ComponentType, Eligible, Manager

    public class InMemorySessionManager
extends Component

    A in memory session manager. The event is associated with a Session object using Session.class as association identifier.

    See Also:
    EventBase.setAssociated(Object, Object), OWASP Session Management Cheat Sheet

      • Fields inherited from interface org.jgrapes.core.Channel

    • Method Detail

      • idName

        public String idName()

        The name used for the session id cookie. Defaults to “id”.

        Returns:
        the id name

      • setIdName

        public InMemorySessionManager setIdName(String idName)
        Parameters:
        idName - the id name to set
        Returns:
        the session manager for easy chaining

      • setMaxSessions

        public InMemorySessionManager setMaxSessions(int maxSessions)

        Set the maximum number of sessions. If the value is zero or less, an unlimited number of sessions is supported. The default value is 1000.

        If adding a new session would exceed the limit, first all sessions older than absoluteTimeout() are removed. If this doesn’t free a slot, the least recently used session is removed.

        Parameters:
        maxSessions - the maxSessions to set
        Returns:
        the session manager for easy chaining

      • maxSessions

        public int maxSessions()
        Returns:
        the maxSessions

      • setAbsoluteTimeout

        public InMemorySessionManager setAbsoluteTimeout(int absoluteTimeout)

        Sets the absolute timeout for a session in seconds. The absolute timeout is the time after which a session is invalidated (relative to its creation time). Defaults to 9 hours. Zero or less disables the timeout.

        Parameters:
        absoluteTimeout - the absolute timeout
        Returns:
        the session manager for easy chaining

      • absoluteTimeout

        public int absoluteTimeout()
        Returns:
        the absolute session timeout (in seconds)

      • setIdleTimeout

        public InMemorySessionManager setIdleTimeout(int idleTimeout)

        Sets the idle timeout for a session in seconds. Defaults to 30 minutes. Zero or less disables the timeout.

        Parameters:
        idleTimeout - the absolute timeout
        Returns:
        the session manager for easy chaining

      • idleTimeout

        public int idleTimeout()
        Returns:
        the idle timeout (in seconds)
